ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: * Dinobot growled at Tavatron s sudden outburst but it was something of what he had expected, one couldn t just yell at another and expect them to just let it

Return-Path: <carnage@...>
Received: (qmail 7339 invoked from network); 12 May 2000 04:02:34 -0000
Received: from unknown (10.1.10.142) by m4.onelist.org with QMQP; 12 May 2000 04:02:34 -0000

Date: 11 May 2000 21:02:33 -0700

X-Sent: 12 May 2000 04:02:33 GMT
Received: from [207.194.22.212] by mail.penpals.com with HTTP; 11 May 2000 21:02:32 PDT
Content-Type: text/plain
Content-Disposition: inline
Mime-Version: 1.0
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
X-Mailer: Web Mail 3.6.3.1
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
From: Carnage Dinobot <carnage@...>


* Dinobot growled at Tavatron's sudden outburst but it was something of what he had expected, one couldn't just yell at another and expect them to just let it go.He watched the dust settle from around the sword that she had thrown upon the ground, but her voice didn't escape his attention.
He listened without emotion to the tale that Tavatron told and he soon came to understand why she had been so concerned for his life...she didn't want to loose him.
He looked down at his mech-fluid stained chest-plate and then at the rifle in his hands, now he finally understood.
Dinobot watched Tavatron turn her back on him and face the Ark, it didn't take a rocket scientist to come to the conclusion that she was upset. She hadn't managed to hide the pain in her optics as she had glared back at him, it was there...hidden among the shadows of her most secret of thoughts and memories.
He looked back at the sword that now lay in the dirt at her heels, thoughts merged and shaped in his mind as he stared at the blades of Activator's weapons.
She had been right about him not lasting long in battle, but he had had no idea that she had suffered such a lose in the past. But even if her knew would he still have done what he did? Would he still just ignore her and continue on to the battle?
The answer was simple...no.
Suddenly his system wavered but then faded into nothing, he dismissed it.
Dinobot realized that he would have hung back and rested just as Tavatron had said that he should, just to keep her armor from going white before her time.
He looked up at Activator's back and snarled, with one quick and smooth move he picked up her sword and walked up behind her.
Dinobot placed a gentle yet firm hand on Activator's shoulder-plate and held her sword out in front of her to take, he growled but it was not at her...it was at himself.*

" I did not mean to cause you such discomfort. I am a...fool."

* That was as close to an apology as he was going to get at the moment, not to mention that that wasn't the easiest thing that he had done in the world.
He then set the sword in her hand, with a sigh he was about to walk back towards the Ark when his systems wavered extremely!
Dinobot stepped back and removed his hand from Activator's shoulder, his systems weren't just wavering...they were going offline!!
His internal computer announced the systems as each blipped out and no longer functioned as suddenly the pain became even to much for him...*


I COMP: " The following systems have ceased to function: Mech fluid pump 6-20 through 2-55 and thermal temperature system. All other systems will cease to function unless subject allows stasis lock to activate in 2 cycles. Power-cells are no longer able to sustain weaponry system 3-4, laser optic defence system now offline. Respirator system had now begun to fail."

* Dinobot growled but he could feel the lose mech fluid begin to seep into his lungs, obviously he didn't need battle to do him in. He went down to one knee and began to breath shallowly and short, he knew that even with his intake of air he wouldn't be able to bring in enough to survive for long.
Dinobot bowed his head, his repair system was still not powerful enough to save him now.
He needed to get into base, and quick!
His computer voiced again but it was failing...*

I COMP: " 12 nano-clicks until stasis lock activates."

* Dinobot now knew the full extent of why Tavatron had worried about him, his lust for battle and ignorance had caused this! He cursed himself until he felt his systems begin to fade, his legs collapsed from underneath him and ground rushed up towards his back.
His wounds had finally gotten the better of him, the cause for this event...bull-headed and stubbornness!
Dinobot landed hard on his back.
A rifle fell to the ground with a clatter not far from a scene where stasis lock was now dominant.
The sound as it struck the earth was the only sound heard but then faded away to silence.*
